attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for the prime minister to re-nationalise the buses. This is in order to stop bus companies cutting well used routes because they are used by the elderly who get free bus travel and students who pay in advance. Furthermore to lower the ridiculously high price of fares caused by privatisation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
